root.name: Confidential Money
root.description: OverviewCharacter design by Takashi Kiriya who is also design character for Death Connection. PlotTake place in New York, seven people had received an invitation letter from a mysterious person called John. One of the person who received the invitation is the heroine, Natalie Taylor. Following by John instructions wrote in the invitation letter, all seven of then including Natalie, created a group called CM7 (Confidential Money 7). Each person had their own personal and financial problems which led them all planning to steal $30 million aswell instructed in the invitation letter.
